sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A true report of Sir Anthony Shierlies iourney ouerland to Venice fro[m] thence by sea to Antioch, Aleppo, and Babilon, and soe to Casbine in Persia: his entertainment there by the great Sophie: his oration: his letters of credence to the Christian princes: and the priuiledg obtained of the great Sophie, for the quiet passage and trafique of all Christian marchants, throughout his whole dominions. Sherley, Anthony, Sir, 1565-1635?
[10] p.
Printed by R, B[lower] for I. I[aggard], London : 1600.
Names in imprint from STC. Signatures: A⁴(-A1) B² . Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

Sherley, Anthony, Sir, 1565-1635?
[10] p.
Printed by R, B[lower] for I. I[aggard], London : 1600.
